group_1.textRight: Then, you decided that this is a suitable place@for cherry blossom viewing.

group_1.textLeft: | Yes. |

group_1.textRight: It was nice to see you again, but I guess@this is goodbye.

group_1.textLeft: | No, I feel like I might have a few things to@learn from Senior-senpai. |
| Moreover, I don't think the cherry blossoms@will be in bloom that day. |
| I need to practice making them bloom from@now on. |

group_1.textRight: It'd be magical if you could really do it.
My, maybe you really can, right?

group_1.textLeft: | ...I don't know. |
| I've never tried with anything but my own tree... |

group_1.textRight: I'm sure you can do it.

group_1.textLeft: | How can you be sure? |

group_1.textRight: It's just a feeling.

group_1.textLeft: She's always been a bit of a dreamer.

group_1.textRight: Oh, dear.
We've been dreaming together here,@haven't we?

group_1.textLeft: | What do you mean? |

group_1.textRight: Well, we were both born and raised in Sankyo.
This sakura tree saved us during a disaster, and@it was here that I proposed to her.
That's why we both fell in love with this@sakura tree.
When our daughter was born, we brought her@here.
We used to have our annual cherry blossom@viewing here.

group_1.textLeft: And now it's our favorite place to go for walks.

group_1.textRight: That's why I'm happy.
You said this was a good place for@cherry blossom viewing.

group_1.textLeft: | Yes. |
| I believe this sakura tree that watches over@everyone is a wonderful tree. |

group_1.textRight: Sounds like we're going to have a cherry@blossom viewing at Sankyo after all.

group_1.textLeft: | Yes, it's an excellent place. |

group_1.textRight: You're really positive about it. I'm surprised.

group_1.textLeft: | Is that so? |

group_1.textRight: To be honest, I thought you might act stubborn@and force us to cancel...

group_1.textLeft: | That may have been true at first, but not@anymore. |
| Manaka is also thinking about desserts to@make. I think it will be enjoyable. |

group_1.textRight: I think so, too.
Alright, today's articles are up!

group_1.textLeft: | The latest issue of the Midori Report? |

group_1.textRight: The highlight of this issue is the article@following Sakurako Hiiragi.
A new series about Sakurako, as she weaves a@tale of humanity beneath the cherry blossoms.
I call it, "Tracks of Cherry Blossoms".

group_1.textLeft: | ...There's a photo. |
| It's me talking to Grandfather and@Grandmother. |

group_1.textRight: The emotional daily life of our school's strange@and mysterious beauty, Sakurako Hiiragi...
I'm sure folks will eat this up.

group_1.textLeft: A sneak shot...
You really shouldn't be so good at that,@you know...
